template.template: Template SNMP Tape Library Oracle StorageTek SL150
template.name: Template SNMP Tape Library Oracle StorageTek SL150
template.description: Based on MIB File: STREAMLINE-TAPE-LIBRARY-MIB Created by Samuel Martins https://github.com/slunart/ https://www.linkedin.com/in/slmartins/ 2020-04-19 Version 1.0

item.name: Agent Ha Alternate Ip
item.description: alternate RE controller's IP address

item.name: Agent Ha identifier
item.description: RE controller identifier. active=0, standby=1

item.name: slAgentHaSlot
item.description: RE controller slot. sideA=0, sideB=1

item.name: Agent Ha State
item.description: RE controller state. simplex=0, duplex(switchable)=1

item.name: Total of Caps
item.description: Count of the CAPs in the CAP table

item.name: Total of Cells
item.description: Count of the storage elements in the cell table

item.name: Number of Available Cells
item.description: Number of available (empty) storage cells in the library

item.name: Number of Available Restricted Cells
item.description: Number of available restricted (empty) storage cells in the library

item.name: Total of Controllers
item.description: Count of the controllers in the controller table

item.name: Total of Drives
item.description: Count of the drives in the drive table

item.name: Total of Elevators
item.description: Count of the elevators in the elevator table

item.name: Total of Fans
item.description: Number of monitored fans in the library

item.name: Clean Enabled
item.description: Auto clean feature configuration. Not all libraries support this feature, please refer to user documentation.

item.name: Total of Clean Cartridges
item.description: Count of the clean cartridges in the library

item.name: Number of cartridge types supported
item.description: Number of unique cartridge types supported

item.name: City
item.description: Location/Site - city

item.name: Contact
item.description: The primary contact for administration

item.name: Country
item.description: Location/Site - country

item.name: Descr
item.description: Location/site - description/misc

item.name: State
item.description: Location/Site - state/province

item.name: Street
item.description: Location/Site - street address

item.name: Zip
item.description: Location/Site - zip code (or other data)

item.name: Total of LSM
item.description: The LSM Count

item.name: State
item.description: The statue of the library (online, offline)

item.name: Top Level Condition
item.description: The overall condition of the library (normal,degraded,not-operational)

item.name: Serial Number
item.description: The library frame serial number

item.name: Cumulative Machine Up Time in Seconds
item.description: Cumulative Machine Up Time in seconds

item.name: Number of Library Initializations
item.description: The number of library initializations

item.name: Number of Times The Service Door Has Been Opened
item.description: The number of times the service door has been opened

item.name: Total Number of Get Failures
item.description: The total number of get failures

item.name: Total Number of Get Retries
item.description: The total number of get retries

item.name: Total Number of Mounts
item.description: The total number of mounts

item.name: Total Number of Cartridge Moves
item.description: The total number of cartridge moves

item.name: Total Number of Put Failures
item.description: The total number of put failures

item.name: Total Number of Put Retries
item.description: The total number of put retries

item.name: UpTime Since Last Boot
item.description: In seconds

item.name: Base Model
item.description: The StorageTek Model Name - see slXXXX section for vendor specific model data

item.name: Boot Software/OS Version
item.description: The library's boot software/OS version

item.name: Firmware Build Date
item.description: The library's embedded firmware build date

item.name: Firmware Version
item.description: The library's embedded firmware version per EC field releases

item.name: Controller Hardware Version
item.description: The library's controller hardware version

item.name: WWN Number
item.description: The libraries WWN number

item.name: Total of Drives in the Drive Media Validation Table
item.description: Count of the drives in the drive Media Validation table

item.name: Total of Power Supplies
item.description: Number of power supplies installed in the library

item.name: Total of Ptp
item.description: Count of the pass-through ports in the library

item.name: Total of Robots
item.description: Count of the number of robots in the table

item.name: Total of Safety Door Center Completions
item.description: The safety door center completion count

item.name: Number of IPL's by the Safety Door
item.description: The number of IPL's performed by the Safety Door

item.name: Total of Safety Door Retries
item.description: The number of total Safety Door retries

item.name: Total of Tapes
item.description: Count of the cartridges in the inventory table

item.name: Total of Temperature Sensors
item.description: Number of temperature sensors in the library

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Controller Status
discovery_rule.description: he controller's operational status in enumerated form

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Status
item_prototype.description: The controller's operational status in enumerated form

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Accessibility
discovery_rule.description: The accessibility of a CAP (open allow/prevent)

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Accessibility
item_prototype.description: The accessibility of a CAP (open allow/prevent)

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Access State
discovery_rule.description: The access state of the cap presented as an enumeration unknown(1), open(2), close(3)

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Access State
item_prototype.description: The access state of the cap presented as an enumeration

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap is Enabled
discovery_rule.description: The Enabled state of the Cap

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} is Enabled
item_prototype.description: The Enabled state of the Cap false(0), true(1)

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Name
discovery_rule.description: The CAP name

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Name
item_prototype.description: The CAP name

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Physical Address
discovery_rule.description: CAP physical address string. NOTE: SL500 returns a logical SCSI Element ID" -- NOTE: For backwards compatibility, the SL500 will continue to return a -- logical SCSI Element ID in lieu of a physical address.

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Physical Address
item_prototype.description: CAP physical address string. NOTE: SL500 returns a logical SCSI Element ID" -- NOTE: For backwards compatibility, the SL500 will continue to return a -- logical SCSI Element ID in lieu of a physical address.

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Rotations
discovery_rule.description: The Caps rotation count

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Rotation Count
item_prototype.description: The Caps rotation count

discovery_rule.name: [Cap] Discovery of Cap Status
discovery_rule.description: The operational status of the CAP presented as an enumeration

item_prototype.name: Cap {#SNMPINDEX} Status
item_prototype.description: The operational status of the CAP presented as an enumeration

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Code Version
discovery_rule.description: The controller's code version

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Code Version
item_prototype.description: The controller's code version

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Controller Fault LED
discovery_rule.description: The Controller's Fault LED state

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Fault LED
item_prototype.description: The Controller's Fault LED state off=0, on=1

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Field Replaceable Unit (FRU)
discovery_rule.description: The controller's Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) based serial number

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Field Replaceable Unit (FRU)
item_prototype.description: The controller's Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) based serial number

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Safe To Remove LED
discovery_rule.description: The Controller's safe to remove LED state

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Safe To Remove LED
item_prototype.description: The Controller's safe to remove LED state

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Controller Top Level Condition
discovery_rule.description: The Controller's top-level condition (normal, degraded, notoperative)

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Top Level Condition
item_prototype.description: The Controller's top-level condition (normal, degraded, notoperative) normal(0), degraded(1), notoperative(2)

discovery_rule.name: [Controller] Discovery of Hardware Version
discovery_rule.description: The controller's hardware version

item_prototype.name: Controller {#SNMPINDEX} Hardware Version
item_prototype.description: The controller's hardware version

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Cell Content Label
discovery_rule.description: The label of the cart in the drive (zero len string if empty, '??????' if unreadable)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Cell Content Label
item_prototype.description: The label of the cart in the drive (zero len string if empty, '??????' if unreadable)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Cell Status
discovery_rule.description: The status of the drive's cell presented as an enumeration

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Cell Status
item_prototype.description: he status of the drive's cell presented as an enumeration unknown(1), empty(2), full(3)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Command Clean
discovery_rule.description: Signal to clean/cancel cleaning of the drive enable(1), cancel(2)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Command Clean
item_prototype.description: Signal to clean/cancel cleaning of the drive enable(1), cancel(2)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Fibre Node Name
discovery_rule.description: Drive's fibre node name (node WWN)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Fibre Node Name
item_prototype.description: Drive's fibre node name (node WWN)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Fibre Port A is Enabled
discovery_rule.description: Port A - is port enabled

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Fibre Port A is Enabled
item_prototype.description: Port A - is port enabled

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Fibre Port B is Enabled
discovery_rule.description: Port B - is port enabled

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Fibre Port B is Enabled
item_prototype.description: Port B - is port enabled

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Fibre Port Count
discovery_rule.description: The number of active ports in the drive

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Fibre Port Count
item_prototype.description: The number of active ports in the drive single(1), dual(2)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Get Retries
discovery_rule.description: The number of mount retries performed to the drive

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Get Retries
item_prototype.description: The number of mount retries performed to the drive

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Hashed Physical Address
discovery_rule.description: Hashed Physical Address of the drive. NOTE: SL500 returns a logical SCSI Element ID -- NOTE: For backwards compatibility, the SL500 will continue to return a -- logical SCSI Element ID in lieu of a physical address.

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Hashed Physical Address
item_prototype.description: Hashed Physical Address of the drive. NOTE: SL500 returns a logical SCSI Element ID" -- NOTE: For backwards compatibility, the SL500 will continue to return a -- logical SCSI Element ID in lieu of a physical address.

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Idle Seconds
discovery_rule.description: Number of seconds that the drive has been idle (unmounted)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Idle Seconds
item_prototype.description: Number of seconds that the drive has been idle (unmounted)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Interface Type
discovery_rule.description: The drive's physical data transport type

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Interface Type
item_prototype.description: The drive's physical data transport type

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive LED
discovery_rule.description: The drive's Tray LED sate (1=on,0=off)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} LED
item_prototype.description: The drive's Tray LED sate (1=on,0=off)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Num Mounts
discovery_rule.description: Number of mounts to the drive

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Num Mounts
item_prototype.description: Number of mounts to the drive

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Put Retries
discovery_rule.description: The number of dismount retries performed to the drive

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Put Retries
item_prototype.description: The number of dismount retries performed to the drive

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Serial Number
discovery_rule.description: The drive's electronic serial number

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Serial Number
item_prototype.description: The drive's electronic serial number

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive State
discovery_rule.description: The drive's state (empty, loaded, needs cleaning, etc)

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} State
item_prototype.description: The drive's state (empty, loaded, needs cleaning, etc)

discovery_rule.name: [Drive] Discovery of Drive Type
discovery_rule.description: The drive's type, e.g. STK9840, HpUltrium4, etc. -- This text string is derived by the manufacturer and make of the drive. -- Please refer to the "Specification for Tape Cartridge Media Identification" -- Sun/Oracle Doc No. 3136715

item_prototype.name: Drive {#SNMPINDEX} Type
item_prototype.description: The drive's type, e.g. STK9840, HpUltrium4, etc." -- This text string is derived by the manufacturer and make of the drive. -- Please refer to the "Specification for Tape Cartridge Media Identification" -- Sun/Oracle Doc No. 3136715

discovery_rule.name: [Fan] Discovery of Fan Name
discovery_rule.description: Name of the fan

item_prototype.name: Fan Name {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Name of the fan

discovery_rule.description: Operational state of the fan

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX} Status
item_prototype.description: Operational state of the fan failed(1), normal(2)

item_prototype.description: Number of times that the cartridge has been used to clean

trigger_prototype.name: The cartridge {#SNMPINDEX} has been used to clean is over than 40 times

item_prototype.description: Configured warn count threshold

discovery_rule.name: [LSM] Discovery of LSM Status
discovery_rule.description: The LSM operational state - reported as a string (online, offline, offlinePending). This is hardware-based state, derived from robot state

item_prototype.name: LSM {#SNMPINDEX} Status
item_prototype.description: The LSM operational state - reported as a string (online, offline, offlinePending). This is hardware-based state, derived from robot state
